name: join-component
readme: # join Join a list in a nice human friendly way. ## Installation $ component install component/join ## API - [join(arr)](#joinarr) - [join(arr, str)](#joinarr-str) # join(arr) should default to "and". ```js join(['foo', 'bar']).should.equal('foo and bar'); ``` # join(arr, str) should join. ```js join([], 'and').should.equal(''); join(['foo'], 'and').should.equal('foo'); join(['foo', 'bar'], 'and').should.equal('foo and bar'); join(['foo', 'bar', 'raz'], 'or').should.equal('foo, bar or raz'); ``` ## License MIT
